title: First Time Receiving A Mystery Gift and Immediately Realized My Mistake When I Closed Said Box
body:
First time posting on these boards as well and hope to use these more as time goes on.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Hey there, welcome to the boards!  Did I just get clickbaited?  ^^  I'd like to help, but I'm not really sure about the issue you're having.  Can you toss me some more context on what happened?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o9nbYtEQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T18:22:32.393+0000)
>
> Hey there, welcome to the boards!  Did I just get clickbaited?  ^^  I'd like to help, but I'm not really sure about the issue you're having.  Can you toss me some more context on what happened?

I just want to know which skin I got even if it is a Karthus forsaken Teemo skin. If there is any way for me to find out I would appreciate it! Didn't mean to sound like clickable I checked my purchase history to hopefully see it there but haven't found anything but gonna try to look through all champs to see which one I got if anything DX

Just go to Store-Account-PURCHASE HISTORY 
and you should see your skin even if you got it from a gift or chest

> [{quoted}](name=Amounts,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o9nbYtEQ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-25T22:17:24.104+0000)
>
> Just go to Store-Account-PURCHASE HISTORY 
> and you should see your skin even if you got it from a gift or chest

Unfortunately it doesn't show D:
He missed one tiiiiiny step. Once you're in the Purchase History tab you'll see a button on the left called "Gifting History". Click that and you'll see all your gifts ^_^!
I don't know which skin I got from a mystery gift and since I own all champions now! (Finally got you Karma!) I have no idea which skin I got since I closed the box that told me.
